warning_signs: Swelling, shortness of breath, decreased urine output
discharge_instructions: Monitor blood pressure daily, weigh yourself daily

warning_signs: Fatigue, confusion, irregular heartbeat
discharge_instructions: Monitor weight daily, check for swelling

warning_signs: High blood sugar, vision changes, numbness in feet
discharge_instructions: Check blood sugar 4 times daily, foot care daily, A1C monitoring

follow_up: Primary care in 2 weeks, nephrology in 1 month
warning_signs: Severe headache, blurred vision, chest pain
discharge_instructions: Blood pressure monitoring twice daily, medication compliance

dietary_restrictions: Normal protein, avoid NSAIDs, adequate hydration
warning_signs: Severe flank pain, blood in urine, fever
discharge_instructions: Annual ultrasound, avoid contact sports, family screening

dietary_restrictions: Low salt, heart healthy diet, calcium supplementation
warning_signs: Joint pain, facial rash, fever, extreme fatigue
discharge_instructions: Sun protection, infection precautions, regular lab monitoring

dietary_restrictions: Low salt, well-cooked foods only, no grapefruit

discharge_instructions: Strict medication adherence, infection prevention, daily weights

warning_signs: Sudden weight gain, severe swelling, frothy urine, difficulty breathing
discharge_instructions: Daily weight monitoring, urine protein checks, edema assessment

discharge_instructions: Blood pressure monitoring, statin therapy, smoking cessation

warning_signs: Severe edema, fatigue, blood clots, heavy proteinuria
discharge_instructions: Regular blood tests, medication monitoring, protein in urine tracking

warning_signs: Gross hematuria, hypertension, proteinuria increase

warning_signs: Worsening edema, weight gain, decreased urine output
discharge_instructions: Daily weights, blood pressure monitoring, steroid side effect monitoring

warning_signs: Decreased urine output, confusion, severe fatigue

follow_up: Nephrology every 2 weeks, dialysis education class scheduled

warning_signs: Hearing changes, vision problems, hematuria
discharge_instructions: Genetic counseling, family screening, ACE inhibitor therapy

warning_signs: Decreased urine, bloody diarrhea, confusion, seizures

warning_signs: Confusion, severe headache, vision changes, decreased urine

discharge_instructions: Gradual return to exercise, avoid statins temporarily, hydration

warning_signs: Fever, rash, decreased urine output, confusion
discharge_instructions: Avoid NSAIDs, allergy documentation, steroid taper protocol

dietary_restrictions: Normal diet, adequate nutrition for healing

warning_signs: Severe hypertension, headache, vision changes, seizures

warning_signs: Bone pain, confusion, decreased urine, bleeding, infection
